title: USB Joystick board on + Xbox Adaptive board (Bad idea)
description:
Amazon Link: https://amzn.to/3JDXNqQ  
Git: https://github.com/EloiStree/2023_06_22_XboxAdaptiveToX360  
I wanted to try if I can connect 2-10€ usb joystick in the Adaptive Controller but that a bad idea. Missing button and not certain to work. Better solution is to use two Micro Python on RP2040 and set a full dual shock joystick.
author: Éloi Strée, ꬲ🧰: Raw video
